title: Straight from the Earth: Irresistible Vegan Recipes
description:
Straight from the Earth: Irresistible Vegan Recipes for Everyone by Myra Goodman, Marea Goodman

English | 2014 | ISBN: 145211269X | 224 pages | EPUB | 20 MB


As environmentally healthful and thoughtful eaters pile on the vegetables and fruits and push animal protein off their plates, the desire for more recipes showcasing fresh produce has gone sky high.

So, who better than the folks at Earthbound Farm to deliver those vegetable-centric recipes? From their humble beginnings as a 2 1/2-acre raspberry field, Earthbound now grows and distributes organic produce nationally. Co-founder Myra Goodman and her daughter Marea are skillful home cooks, and the proximity to their fields of fresh vegetables and fruits made it easy to develop creativeÃ¢â‚¬â€and definitely deliciousÃ¢â‚¬â€dishes that are not only heavy on the produce, they just happen to be vegan!
